sentences.chinese: 凡姦聲感人而逆氣應之，逆氣成象而淫樂興焉。
sentences.literal: All wicked sounds move people and perverse qi responds to them, perverse qi forms images and licentious music arises there.

sentences.chinese: 正聲感人而順氣應之，順氣成象而和樂興焉。
sentences.literal: Correct sounds move people and compliant qi responds to them, compliant qi forms images and harmonious music arises there.

sentences.chinese: 倡和有應，回邪曲直各歸其分，而萬物之理以類相動也。
sentences.literal: Leading and following have response, returning deviant curved straight each return to their portion, and ten thousand things' principle move each other by kind.

sentences.chinese: 是故君子反情以和其志，比類以成其行。
sentences.literal: Therefore gentlemen return to emotion to harmonize their will, compare kinds to complete their conduct.

sentences.chinese: 姦聲亂色不留聰明，淫樂廢禮不接於心術，惰慢邪辟之氣不設於身體，使耳目鼻口心知百體皆由順正，以行其義。
sentences.literal: Wicked sounds chaotic colors do not detain intelligence, licentious music abandons ritual does not connect to heart methods, lazy lax heretical deviant qi not established in the body; make ears eyes nose mouth heart knowing hundred bodies all follow orderly correctness, to carry out their righteousness.

sentences.chinese: 然後發以聲音，文以琴瑟，動以干戚，飾以羽旄，從以簫管，奮至德之光，動四氣之和，以著萬物之理。
sentences.literal: Then express with sound and tone, pattern with zither and se, move with shield and axe, adorn with feather banners, follow with flute pipes; arouse supreme virtue's light, move four qi harmony, to manifest ten thousand things' principle.

sentences.chinese: 是故清明象天，廣大象地，終始象四時，周旋象風雨；
sentences.literal: Therefore clear brightness imitates heaven, vast greatness imitates earth, beginning and end imitate four seasons, circling imitates wind and rain;

sentences.chinese: 五色成文而不亂，八風從律而不姦，百度得數而有常；
sentences.literal: Five colors form patterns and are not chaotic, eight winds follow laws and are not wicked, hundred measures obtain numbers and have constancy;

sentences.chinese: 小大相成，終始相生，倡和清濁，代相為經。
sentences.literal: Small and great mutually complete, beginning and end mutually give birth, leading following clear turbid, alternating become canons.

sentences.chinese: 故樂行而倫清，耳目聰明，血氣和平，移風易俗，天下皆寧。
sentences.literal: Therefore when music proceeds relationships are clear, ears and eyes intelligent, blood qi peaceful, shift winds change customs, all under heaven peaceful.
Therefore it is said 'Music is joy.'

sentences.chinese: 君子樂得其道，小人樂得其欲。
sentences.literal: Gentlemen take joy in obtaining their way, small people take joy in obtaining their desires.
Using way to control desires, then joyful but not chaotic;
Using desires to forget way, then confused and not joyful.

sentences.chinese: 是故君子反情以和其志，廣樂以成其教，樂行而民鄉方，可以觀德矣。
sentences.literal: Therefore gentlemen return to emotion to harmonize their will, broaden music to complete their teachings; when music proceeds and people face the square, virtue can be observed.
